snippet: JPMorgan Chase rose 2.9 percent after the bank reported earnings that were better than analysts expected.
abstract: Energy stocks propel market rally; stocks have biggest gain in over month.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase rose 2.9 percent after the bank reported earnings that were better than analysts expected.

headline.main: Market Rebounds, Led Higher by Energy Shares
headline.print_headline: Energy Sector Leads a Broader Market Rally
